item.title: V Hack Android
item.description:
Location: Bouncespace, Amsterdam (former booking.com building)
Date: September 12th, 2012

Android 5 years!

On November 5th, 2012 Android celebrated its 5th birthday. To celebrate this, Google developer- and technology user group leaders in Europe announced the 'V Hack Android' hackathon (pronounced 'We Hack Android').

V Hack Android Dutch edition

The "V Hack Android" Netherlands hackathon was held in the weekend of Friday 14th - Sunday 16th of September 2012. The Google+ event page contains the transcript of the event.

Hackathon schedule

Friday

19:00 - 21:30 Opening scrum with drinks & snacks

Saturday

10:00 Opening hackathon day 1
13:00 Lunch
18:00 Dinner
22:00 End

Sunday

10:00 Opening hackathon day 2
13:00 Lunch
16:00 Code freeze (Main area open to public / press)
16:30 Demos and votes
17:30 Announcement of winners / results
18:30 End
